title: Beginner English Conversation Competency Enhancement Course Using Chatbot-Assisted Flipped Learning [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic English sentence structures and mastering simple daily conversational expressions
context.additional_context: Maximizes learning transfer effects through real-time chatbot conversation practice in VR environments, providing customized conversational content for job-related scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can maintain an English conversation with a chatbot for over 5 minutes in a VR simulation environment, utilizing over 80% of situational key expressions.
Learners can improve error rates to below 20% in chatbot practice after pre-learning (3-minute video lecture, 10-question quiz) under a flipped learning model.
Learners can achieve a score of 70 or above (out of 100) in communication fluency based on peer evaluation criteria in formative assessments (weekly role-play tests).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
